/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Street signs and traffic lights punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of traffic. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight, further enhancing the lively atmosphere of the city.
